A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a stellar Star Wars film that is about more than just laser sword fights and laser gun fights. The humor also worked\, and my kids were bouncing in their seats during the funnier parts of the film. My only beef is that some parts looked a little too much like our earth\, which was a mistake of the prequels. Of course\, many parts were simply alien\, and outstanding at that.
